original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses, ‘Who has made human mouths? Who makes a person that cannot speak? Who makes a person that cannot hear? Who makes a person who can see, or who cannot see? It is I, the Lord God!
korean_text: 여호와께서 그에게 이르시되 누가 사람의 입을 지었느냐 누가 말 못 하는 자나 못 듣는 자나 눈 밝은 자나 맹인이 되게 하였느냐 나 여호와가 아니냐

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses
Who makes a person that cannot speak?
Who makes a person that cannot hear?
Who makes a person who can see
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 볼 수 있는 사람을 만드는가

sentences.original_text: It is I, the Lord God!
